Medium: Portfolio of fourteen lithographs, duplicate transfer lithograph, and song sheet
Dimensions: sheet (portfolio): 12 13/16 x 9 13/16" (32.5 x 25cm); sheet (song): 13 3/4 x 10 5/8" (35 x 27cm)
Title: Quatorze lithographies originales (Mélodies de Désiré Dihau)
Date: 1935 (Lithographs executed and songsheet first published by C. Joubert 1895)
